column4: I have been trying to run warsow on my laptop with ubuntu, I do not believe my video card is using the best drivers that it can use, as the game will not even run. I have an ati x1200 series card. I had the same problem with jaunty, and even did the suggested rollback fix on intrepid. I am on the koala beta now.
#warsow on irc.quakenet.org might be more help
and they will tell me to ask here about getting the drivers setup right
or give you a flag to pass the binary file
